column1: Smoque BBQ////We went there on a Friday evening for pick up and
column3: didn't even have to wait in a line.  We walked up to the counter
column4: grabbed two paper menus (as the chalkboard menu gives my eyes hell) and stepped to the side.  About 3 minutes later
column5: we were approached by one of the employees who asked us if we had any questions and
column7: politely excused himself but made sure to tell us where we could find him if we changed our mind.
